Package MobileApplication.Group.Theme

Class TriviaQuestion

java.lang.Object
MobileApplication.Group.Theme.TriviaQuestion
public class TriviaQuestion extends Object
Represents a trivia question with a question text, correct answer, and incorrect options.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TriviaQuestion(String question, String correctAnswer, String[] incorrectAnswers)
    Constructs a TriviaQuestion object with the specified question, correct answer, and incorrect answers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getCorrectAnswer()
    Gets the correct answer for this trivia question.
    String[]
    getIncorrectAnswers()
    Gets an array of incorrect answers for this trivia question.
    String
    getOption1()
    Gets option 1, which is the same as the correct answer.
    String
    getOption2()
    Gets option 2, which is the first incorrect answer in the array of incorrect answers.
    String
    getOption3()
    Gets option 3, which is the second incorrect answer in the array of incorrect answers.
    String
    getOption4()
    Gets option 4, which is the third incorrect answer in the array of incorrect answers.
    String

    Gets the question text for this trivia question.
    String[]
    getShuffledOptions()
    Gets an array of shuffled options, including the correct answer and incorrect answers.

  • Constructor Details

    • TriviaQuestion

      public TriviaQuestion(String question, String correctAnswer, String[] incorrectAnswers)
      Constructs a TriviaQuestion object with the specified question, correct answer, and incorrect answers.
      Parameters:
      question - The trivia question.
      correctAnswer - The correct answer to the trivia question.
      incorrectAnswers - An array containing incorrect options for the trivia question.

  • Method Details

    • getShuffledOptions

      public String[] getShuffledOptions()
      Gets an array of shuffled options, including the correct answer and incorrect answers. The order of the options is randomized each time this method is called.
      Returns:
      An array of shuffled options.

    • getQuestion

      public String getQuestion()
      Gets the question text for this trivia question.
      Returns:
      The question text.

    • getCorrectAnswer

      public String getCorrectAnswer()
      Gets the correct answer for this trivia question.
      Returns:
      The correct answer.

    • getIncorrectAnswers

      public String[] getIncorrectAnswers()
      Gets an array of incorrect answers for this trivia question.
      Returns:
      An array of incorrect answers.

    • getOption1

      public String getOption1()
      Gets option 1, which is the same as the correct answer.
      Returns:
      Option 1 text (the correct answer).

    • getOption2

      public String getOption2()
      Gets option 2, which is the first incorrect answer in the array of incorrect answers.
      Returns:
      Option 2 text (the first incorrect answer).

    • getOption3

      public String getOption3()
      Gets option 3, which is the second incorrect answer in the array of incorrect answers. If there are no more incorrect answers available, an empty string is returned.
      Returns:
      Option 3 text or an empty string if not available.

    • getOption4

      public String getOption4()
      Gets option 4, which is the third incorrect answer in the array of incorrect answers. If there are no more incorrect answers available, an empty string is returned.
      Returns:
      Option 4 text or an empty string if not available.
